version_description:
USER PRESETS! now you can save your own presets, you even can save the random filter (tap!tap!tap!) presets!*

MODERN/LEGACY switch has been moved to device stettings

Minur Bugs fixed.

*User presets works only in MODERN version.
USER PRESETS SHARING: Now user presets can be shared with email, DropBox, Airdrop etc...

+ + + VIDEO RECORDING! + + +
Finally real time video can be saved. [iPhone 5S and above]

+ + + Interface redesigned. + + +
Now the 'SHARE' button and 'ROTATE CAMERA' button share the same place, you need to use 'PAUSE' button before saving.<

+ VIDEO FRAME RATE:
- Force video recording to 10, 20 o 30 FPS to get fast motion effect.

+ TWO NEW FILTERS:
- N-PASS - Classic vectorization.
- GoldDroid - Original polygonal filter

+ ADOBE CREATIVE CLOUD SUPPO

+ Video recording with AUDIO

+ Video recording 60% faster

+ PDF sharing (vectorial file in pdf format)

Bugs fixed.
BUG FIXED: saving pictures works again!

VERSION 5.0 is here ! and brings you a COLOR EDITOR!

___________News on this update:

Unique and original color editor
- Change image colors individually.
- Change the color of individual paths.
- Paint over the image with existing

BUGS FIXED: iPad interface and Colorado filter not working properly

NEW IN VERSION 5.0:

++ + ++ + + + + + COLOR EDITOR! + + + + + + + +

___________News on this update:

Unique and original color editor
- Change image color

Import Video feature.
Filters enhanged *
iPad full rotation interface
Bugs fixed

* New filters version can differ from previous version, if you are working in a project please wait until finish it to update.

Bugs fixed:
Missing sliders on iPad Pro.
Wrong orientation on landscape videos.
Standard video picker to improve 'video import'

version_name: 6 is coming with great enhancements. Available in a few weeks! * * * *                                                                                                                                                                                Version 5

version_description:
Interface improvements:
Full screen on iPhone and iPad.
Now interface should rotate properly on iPad.
A button to hide/show controls.

Stability enhanced.

Bugs fixed.

Small changes:
- Import pictures from Dropbox.

* * * * Version 6 is coming with great enhancements. Available in a few weeks! * * * *

Bug on iOS 11 launch fix.

* Version 6 available in 3 weeks!
Fixed Interface disappear when launching bug.
Adobe Creative Cloud login bug fixed.
Bug fixed: Buttons labels, and text missing.

Finally... VERSION 6 is here, the biggest update since version 2.0!

- Totally new vectorizing algorithm with new filters, with AI powered color reduction,
- Export vector files with layers.
- Better curve fitting, fewer vertices and smaller

Fix for missing layer thumbnails in some devices.

* NEWS IN PREVIOUS UPDATE *:

VERSION 6 is here, the biggest update since version 2.0!

- Totally new vectorizing algorithm with new filters, with AI powered color reduction,
- Expor

Fix for real time camera wrong flipping. Fix for interface not displaying properly.

* NEWS IN PREVIOUS UPDATE *:

VERSION 6 is here, the biggest update since version 2.0!

- Totally new vectorizing algorithm with new filters, with AI p

Bugs fixed:
-Critical bug importing and rendering videos.
-Critical bug with complex pictures.
-Memory and performance optimizations.


* NEWS IN PREVIOUS UPDATE *:

VERSION 6 is here, the biggest update since version 2.0!

Some Bugs Fixed.
A few new features in next updates.
Fixing BUG: purchasing/restoring not persisting in previous update.

Bug when 'Open-In' on iPads fixed.

* Not many news lately because version 7 is close and it will bring a ton improvements, the biggest change since the beginning of Imaengine!

- Added variable frame rate in real-time video recording.
- UI for iPhone X enhanced.

Bug fix: Export video at 1080px works again.
Small bugs fixed.

UI fix for new devices.
4K video rendering.

Bug when 'Open-In' on iPads fixed.

* Not many news lately because version 7 is close and it will bring a ton improvements, the biggest change since the beginning of Imaengine!

Only Bug Fixes for now.

Working hard on the new version, coming soon for MacOS, iOS and the new iPadOS!
Problems importing pictures  fixed.
